entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning then changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 10. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
